Text:
Most people who download this will say the audio quality is very low. Someone "enhanced" the "overall sound quality." What this means is that they tweaked the EQ and added a short but loud reverb that creates a brassy ring when Jay-Z speaks (I hesitate to say "sings") certain tones.

If you have a shitty pair of "hollow sounding" speakers that are missing their middle and upper-mid range tones, download this torrent. Otherwise leave it alone, it sucks.

Where did bannedmusic dot org go? :C
